targets.expr: sum by (projectId, hostID, name) (edge_host_status{hostID="$hostId", projectId="$projectId", name!="", name!="$hostId"})
sum by (projectId, hostID, name) (edge_host_status{hostID="$hostId", projectId="$projectId", name="$hostId"})
sum by (projectId, hostID, name) (edge_host_status{hostID="$hostId", projectId="$projectId", name=""})

panels.description: Max and average temperature from given time range
panels.title: Core Temperature

panels.description: Sum of all disks on device
panels.title: Disk Total

panels.description: Total size of each disk on the edge node in bytes. Detected by the lsblk command.
panels.title: Total disk bytes

panels.description: Total amount of space on each disk assigned to LVMs in bytes. Detected by the lsblk command.
panels.title: Total used LVM bytes

panels.description: Total available bytes on each disk. Determined from the difference between the total disk size and the total amount of the disk in use in the partitions and assigned to LVMs.
panels.title: Total disk available bytes

panels.description: Total amount of space in use across all partitions on each disk in bytes. Detected by the df command.
panels.title: Total used bytes
